answers.answer: I'm 28 weeks and just had my gdm testing done 2 weeks ago... The drink they give you is really sweet, mine was so sweet I didn't want to finish it. They gave me my test results right then and there.  Blood sugar came back fine for me and I'm not anemic, don't be too nervous im sure all will come out fine. Good luck!
Thank you! How long were you there for ?

question: So I am going today for my 25 week appt.  I have some questions already written down but was just wondering if anyone had anything else I should add! I am also getting the glucose test done. My nurse friend told me that They have you drink a drink and wait an hour so I will be there a while.  Has anyone done this recently? Do they Gove your results right after? I think it is to check for gestational diabetes. I'm a little nervous!
title: questions to ask ob?
